committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: To establish the Organ Mountains National Conservation Area in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
short_title: Organ Mountains National Conservation Area Establishment Act

summary.text: Organ Mountains National Conservation Area Establishment Act - Establishes the Organ Mountains National Conservation Area in New Mexico. Declares that the Organ Mountains Coordinated Resource Management Plan, April 1989, Bureau of Land Management, shall be the management plan for such Area. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Organ Mountains National Conservation Area Establishment Act
To establish the Organ Mountains National Conservation Area in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.
